messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Cheap copy ???
messages.msgSnippet: Rich, Looks like I m a bit behind on my email... it definitely looks like a badly done, copper alloy cast. Several groups produced that multi-nakago motif.
messages.messageBody:
Rich,
Looks like I'm a bit behind on my email... it definitely looks like a badly done, copper alloy cast.

Several groups produced that "multi-nakago" motif.

Jim



http://makeashorterlink.com/?L2C5217B6

Is this brass tsuba just a cheap cast copy or is it better than that,
I thought by the surface of the seppa dai it is cast. I always like
the Shoami guard in the Peabody collection. I thought this was cute
but looked pretty poorly made.

cheers

Rich

messages.msgSnippet: I for one love it and would like to see the back. Not sure of the material and it doesn t impress but I like this version of the motif... -t
messages.messageBody:
I for one love it and would like to see the back. Not sure of the
material and it doesn't impress but I like this version of the motif...
-t
